name: Kezaria for Oculus
description:
Explore the deserted city of Kezaria, climb buildings, avoid monsters or shoot them. Use the zip-line to get to the top of the mountain!

This is our first attempt to add Oculus to our VRTK game. Looking for feedback to see how it works. Thanks. The scene Kezaria is part of our bigger game: Fantabula (only for VIVE at this time).

PLATFORMS:

Oculus

HTCVIVE

OpenVR / SteamVR

(This is part of a bigger game: Fantabula, which is also up on itch.io but only works right now with OpenVR / HTCVIVE. We are experimenting with putting the Oculus in it.)

FANTABULA: https://accidentalwizardry.itch.io/fantabula
